name: links-helper
description: Opens external and rule-matched internal links in new tabs. Converts text to hyperlinks, image links to tags.
description_userscript: Open external links in a new tab, open internal links matching the specified rules in a new tab, convert text to hyperlinks, convert image links to image tags(), parse Markdown style links and image tags, parse BBCode style links and image tags
description_userscript:zh-CN: 支持所有网站在新标签页中打开第三方网站链接（外链），在新标签页中打开符合指定规则的本站链接，解析文本链接为超链接，微信公众号文本转可点击的超链接，图片链接转图片标签，解析 Markdown 格式链接与图片标签，解析 BBCode 格式链接与图片标签
author: Pipecraft

scripts.staging:userscript: node scripts/userscript/build.mjs --staging && pnpm prettier --log-level warn --write build/userscript-staging/
scripts.build:chrome: cross-env PARCEL_WORKER_BACKEND=process plasmo build && node scripts/chrome/update-manifest.mjs
scripts.build:firefox: cross-env PARCEL_WORKER_BACKEND=process plasmo build --target=firefox-mv3 && node scripts/firefox/update-manifest.mjs && addons-linter build/firefox-mv3-prod/
scripts.build:userscript: node scripts/userscript/build.mjs && pnpm prettier --log-level warn --write build/userscript-prod/
scripts.build:module: node scripts/module/build.mjs && pnpm prettier --log-level warn --write build/module-prod/
